terre-selvagge-dnd5e.setting.formulaCraf: Formula negativa per il crafting senza competenza
Si tratta di una formula per applicare un effetto negativo allo strumento per fare qualcosa senza competenza. es. -2, o -1d4
terre-selvagge-dnd5e.setting.reset.name: Reset settings to default
terre-selvagge-dnd5e.setting.reset.label: Reset Settings To Default
terre-selvagge-dnd5e.setting.reset.hint: This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default.
terre-selvagge-dnd5e.setting.debug.name: Enable debugging
terre-selvagge-dnd5e.setting.debug.label: Prints debug messages to the console
terre-selvagge-dnd5e.dialogs.resetsettin: Are you sure you want to reset all of the module settings to the current system's defaults? THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE!
